thread.title: A nice touch of photographic irony
thread.title_full: A nice touch of photographic irony - The Washington Post

author: washingtonpost.com
title: A nice touch of photographic irony
text:
October 9 at 7:44 PM The photo of a distracted cellphone user walking past a store window with a sign reading “SO OBSESSED” was perfect [“ Distracted cellphone users walk a dangerous path, ” Metro, Sept. 28]. It’s nice to see clever humor in The Post beyond the Style Invitational.
David A. Prevar , Annapolis
